Mobility Formula*

Order multiple bottles and pay even less — see below

The Basement Beast Mobility Formula combines the most researched joint supporting supplements and natural anti-inflammatories into one easy-to-take pill.*

The Mobility Formula may:

  • Prevent Joint Breakdown
    Studies have shown that Glucosamine is used by the body to build tendons, ligaments, cartilage, and the fluid that surrounds joints. Taking glucosamine might, therefore, help reduce wear and tear of the joints and prevent their breakdown. *
  • Reduce Inflammation
    MSM (methylsulfonylmethane), Turmeric Curcumin, and Quercetin are found naturally in plants and animals and are potent anti-inflammatories commonly used to treat osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, tendonitis, and tenosynovitis. Studies show that Turmeric Curcumin may be more powerful than Ibuprofen or Aspirin for anti-inflammatory support.*
  • Reduce Joint Swelling and Discomfort
    Boswellia Extract and Quercetin boost several terpenes, tetracyclic triterpenic acids and four major pentacyclic triterpenic acids. Studies have shown that these powerful immune modulators reduce joint swelling and discomfort. *
How To Use
Ingredients
How To Use
Directions: For best results, take two (2) capsules daily before a meal. 
 
Warning: Consult with a physician prior to use if you have any medical conditions. Glucosamine is derived from shellfish. People allergic to shellfish should not consume this product. Keep out of reach of children. 
 
KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. DO NOT USE IF SAFETY SEAL IS DAMAGED OR MISSING. STORE IN A COOL, DRY PLACE. 
 
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food & Drug Administration. This product is intended for use by adults over the age of 18 only. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. 
Ingredients

SUPPLEMENT FACTS

Serving Size: 2 Capsules
Servings Per Container  30
Ingredients Amount Per Serving % Daily Value
Glucosamine Sulfate 1000 mg **
Boswellia Extract (Boswellia serrata) (herb) 133.3 mg **
Chondroitin Sulfate 100 mg **
Turmeric (Curcuma longa) (root) 100 mg **
Quercetin (Sophora japonica) (bud) 16.7 mg **
Methionine 16.7 mg **
MSM (Methylsulfonylmethane) 16.7 mg **
Bromelain (Ananas comosus) (stem) 16.7 mg **
Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. ** Daily Value not established.
Other Ingredients: Cellulose (Vegetable Capsule), Rice Flour
Contains: Shellfish (Crayfish)
